channel.title: How to make ice barrage freeze people (help plz no multi target)
channel.description: can someone help me, i have ice barrage and it works but is dosnt freeze people to the spot i have looked all over for tuts and can't find one so i thought i would ask someone if they could tell me how to make ice barrage freeze people, but not multi target, plz i would really aperciate it.
